title: Am I the only AP main that is jealous of the new Essence reaver?
body: I wish AP champs could have something as cool as that....sigh....

replies.body:
Riot logic :

-Hey let's rework Ahri and give her CD reduction on her non-ultimate abilities when she hits people with her R ! 

-I have a better idea, let's bring ahri back to the state we said was unhealthy and give that awesome new change to the adc overlord because who doesn't love to rightclick to win ?

Maybe it's because that state isn't unhealthy anymore?

I mean, correct me if I'm wrong, but the issue at the time was DFG alongside her E's amp, right? It just became too much damage at once.

Now she's a bit more properly balanced, and now they have other tools to balance her.
DFG was the reason she got a charm amp on her E in the first place.

She got/had the amplifier on her E even after  DFG was removed. Her E tho powerful was a hit or miss situation,because it occupied  most of her power budget. She either hit it and killed the squishy ( if she even did decently early) or she missed and dealt 50-60% of their HP and was left vulnerable.

I can't on the behalf on Ahri players , who actually play her , but IMO the ulty with reset would have been a better solution on the long run. It wouldn't divide the power in her kit into a basic ability and would allow for some sick outplays if she used her ultimate efficiently.

>She got/had the amplifier on her E even after DFG was removed.

No. she. did. not.

Patch 5.2 both DFG and the E amp were removed.

>but IMO the ulty with reset would have been a better solution on the long run. It wouldn't divide the power in her kit into a basic ability and would allow for some sick outplays if she used her ultimate efficiently.

Ahri is not a machine gun mage. She does not need innate CDR. She has all the tools in her kit to outplay someone without it.

> She got/had the amplifier on her E even after DFG was removed.

I don't know why i see this said so much, there was never a point Ahri had her charm amp while DFG was out of the game (Till this year).
Ahri is unhealthy now? I don't think so.

I made a full check up on her... just to be safe.

I think she is fine... no signs of illness.
